subject: Re: Thanks, we are ready to lend you some cash regardless of Credit
body:
Your your credit report doesn't matter to us!
 
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is our best deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this offer will expire TONIGHT):
 
$442,000+ debt
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest entire payment!
 
Hurry, when our best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this short form... 
 
Don't worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
 
http://greenitsealthh.com/
